attribute-definition.description: Renders an alternative URL in main navigation. Uses Salesforce Commerce Cloud content url notation. For example: $url('Account-Show')$ or normal URL http://xchange.demandware.com

Used to define the content asset used to populate a grid page banner for a category. This value is applied to all sub-category navigation (cascading) if no specific catBannerID has been defined for a sub-category.
Use this attribute to apply custom styles for this category.

Used to define if/when the Compare feature is to be visualized in the storefront based on navigation. If enableCompare = FALSE, no Compare checkboxes will be displayed in the grid view. If enableCompare = TRUE, the category (and its children) will support the Compare feature.
Which way to orient the menu and optional header menu HTML. Vertical will list all in one line. Horizontal will list in columns.

Used to indicate that a category (such as Mens -> Footwear -> Boots) will display in the roll-over navigation. A sub-category only shows if also the parent category is marked as showInMenu. Up to three category levels are shown in roll-over navigation.

Used to define the content asset ID of the Size Chart that is appropriate for products whose PRIMARY category is the associated category (and its children). Whenever a product detail page (or quick view) is rendered, the Size Chart link is populated based on the value of this attribute for the products primary categorization. If not defined, NO size chart link is displayed.
Image used on either the top or bottom slot on the category landing pages.
Use this attribute to apply custom styles for this content asset.
If true, will open in a new tab in the browser
The number of items returned by this customer
Use this attribute to apply custom styles for this category.

Set or unset the opening movie

attribute-definition.description: Used to map the shipment to a brick and mortar store.

attribute-definition.display-name: When this attribute equals 'instore', the checkout flow will assign the shipping method (005) which has a no shipping charge.

attribute-definition.description: This is text used by the end user when sending a message to the brick and mortar store about the shipment. This is reflected in the order export.
Semicolon separated list
When true, this causes a TLS check to take place based on whether or not a cookie ('dw_TLSWarning') has been set on the browser

Die Action die durch dieses Definition gerufen wird.
The action called for this definition.
Eine Beschreibung.
A description.

Die Defintion der Parameter die in dieser Definition genutzt werden können. Folgendes Format muss eingehalten werden: [{“id” : “attr1”,“name” : “A readable name”,“type” : “boolean|date|time|datetime|double|int|string|password|enum”,"enumValues":["value1", ...],“mandatory” : true|false},...]

Definition of parameters which can be used for this definition in the following format: [{“id” : “attr1”,“name” : “A readable name”,“type” : “boolean|date|time|datetime|double|int|string|password|enum”,"enumValues":["value1", ...],“mandatory” : true|false},...]

key-definition.description: Eine ID generiert aus der Workflow Instance, der Component Definition und der Position.
An ID generated of the workflow instance, the component definition and the position.

attribute-definition.description: Die Action die durch dieses Definition gerufen wird. (eine Kopie der Definition; um eine unabhängige Ausführung während eine Defintionsupdates zu gewähleisten)
The action called for this instance. (a copy of the definition; to allow an undependent execution when updating definitions)
Wenn true, dann wird die Komponente asynchron ausgeführt, sonst synchron. (eine Kopie der Definition; um eine unabhängige Ausführung während eine Defintionsupdates zu gewähleisten)
If true, the component will be executed asynchronous, else synchronous. (a copy of the definition; to allow an undependent execution when updating definitions)
Defines at which level the job component logging should be done. It uses the settings from the WorkflowScheduleInstance if 'inherit' is selected.
Wenn true, dann wird die Komponente nicht asynchron ausgeführt.
If true, the component execution will be skipped.
The display name for this definition
Der Endzeitpunkt.
The point of time when the component finished.
Defines at which level the job base file logging should be done. It uses the settings from the WorkflowScheduleInstance if 'inherit' is selected.

Die Defintion der Parameter die in dieser Definition genutzt werden können. Folgendes Format muss eingehalten werden: [{“id” : “attr1”,“name” : “A readable name”,“type” : “boolean|date|time|datetime|double|int|string|password|enum”,"enumValues":["value1", ...],“mandatory” : true|false},...] (eine Kopie der Definition; um eine unabhängige Ausführung während eine Defintionsupdates zu gewähleisten)

Definition of parameters which can be used for this definition in the following format: [{“id” : “attr1”,“name” : “A readable name”,“type” : “boolean|date|time|datetime|double|int|string|password|enum”,"enumValues":["value1", ...],“mandatory” : true|false},...] (a copy of the definition; to allow an undependent execution when updating definitions)

Die Parameter als JSON mit folgendem Format: {“attribute1 id” : “attribute1 value”,“attribute2 id” : “attribute2 value”,...} (eine Kopie der Definition; um eine unabhängige Ausführung während eine Defintionsupdates zu gewähleisten)

The parameters as JSON in the following format: {“attribute1 id” : “attribute1 value”,“attribute2 id” : “attribute2 value”,...} (a copy of the definition; to allow an undependent execution when updating definitions)
Die Position. (eine Kopie der Definition; um eine unabhängige Ausführung während eine Defintionsupdates zu gewähleisten)
The position. (a copy of the definition; to allow an undependent execution when updating definitions)

The ID of the executing DW job.

The current status.

Status messages describing the workflow of the component.

The name (ID) of the relating WorkflowComponentDefinition object.

The ID of the corresponding workflow schedule instance.
Defines at which level the job component logging should be done. No file logging is done when 'none' has been selected.

A description.

Check to enable the workflow.
Der Zeitpunkt ab dem der workflow startet.

The point of time to which the workflow will be executed.
Das Intervall in dem der workflow läuft.
The interval at which the workflow will run.

The type of the interval.
Die Uhrzeit an der der workflow läuft.
The time at which the workflow will run.
Die Tage an denen der workflow läuft.

Defines at which level the job base file logging should be done. No file logging is done when 'none' has been selected.

A set of string with the notification email addresses.

A set of string with the statuses at which a notification email will be sent.
Die IDs der Seiten für die der Workflow ausgeführt werden soll.
The IDs of the sites for which the workflow will be executed.
Der Typ des workflows. Recurring workflows laufen in einem festgelegtem Intervall und single workflows nur einmal.
The type of the workflow. Recurring workflows will run in a given intervall and single workflows will run only one time.
